analyzed: strīparva
nārāyaṇam namaskṛtya naram ca eva narottamam

original: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_12.1 //
analyzed: devīm sarasvatīm vyāsam tatas jayam udīrayet
gāndhārī dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ca rājā vyākula mānasau
hatau atha sutān draṣṭum sa utkaṇṭhau iva jagmatuḥ

original: tatra tau vilapantau ca kṣipantau ca tanuṃ bhuvi /
analyzed: tatra tau vilapantau ca kṣipantau ca tanum bhuvi
bhagavān atha ca abhyetya pārāśaryaḥ vyalokayat

original: sa dīnaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau hataputraṃ nareśvaram /
analyzed: sa dīnam patitam bhūmau hata putram nareśvaram

original: vidureṇa sahovāca kṛṣṇena ca kṛpākulaḥ // Bhmj_12.4 //
analyzed: vidureṇa saha uvāca kṛṣṇena ca kṛpā ākulaḥ

original: abhāvaḥ prākca paścācca dehināṃ satataṃ sthitaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvaḥ prāk ca paścāt ca dehinām satatam sthitaḥ

original: teṣu madhyavikāreṣu kaḥ śnehaṃ kartumarhasi // Bhmj_12.5 //
analyzed: teṣu madhya vikāreṣu kaḥ śneham kartum arhasi
apāre smin bhava ambhodhau bhavanti na bhavanti ca
jala budbuda vat sarve karma yogena jantavaḥ
satyam bhū bhāra śānti artham ajāyata suyodhanaḥ

original: sa ca yātastathā kṛtvā kastvaṃ tasya sa kastava // Bhmj_12.7 //
analyzed: sa ca yātaḥ tathā kṛtvā kaḥ tvam tasya sa kaḥ tava
narendra mā kṛthāḥ śokam pravṛtte smin mahā ālaye

original: pratīpameti yātānāṃ kaṇikāpi na pārṣadām // Bhmj_12.8 //
analyzed: pratīpam eti yātānām kaṇikā api na pārṣadām
āyāsāya prayāsaḥ yam śoka vyasana saṃbhavaḥ

original: adhunā duḥkhavṛkṣāṇāṃ sneho mūlaṃ nivāryatām // Bhmj_12.9 //
analyzed: adhunā duḥkha vṛkṣāṇām snehaḥ mūlam nivāryatām

original: namaḥ kālāya yaḥ ko 'pi vidyate mṛtyunā vṛtaḥ /
analyzed: namaḥ kālāya yaḥ kaḥ pi vidyate mṛtyunā vṛtaḥ

original: kāyo vārdhakamāyāti svayaṃ yena śarīriṇām // Bhmj_12.10 //
analyzed: kāyaḥ vā ardhakam āyāti svayam yena śarīriṇām
ātma aparādhāt putrāḥ te kālena kavalīkṛtāḥ
tasmāt na pāṇḍa putrebhyaḥ kilbiṣāt kroddham arhasi
dharma nityāḥ kṛta dhiyaḥ te dharmeṇa kṣatāḥ tava

original: pāṇḍavā bhrātaraṃ smṛtvā kāluṣyaṃ teṣu mā kṛthāḥ // Bhmj_12.12 //
analyzed: pāṇḍavāḥ bhrātaram smṛtvā kāluṣyam teṣu mā kṛthāḥ

original: gāndhārīṃ brūhi sahasā mohe majjati no yathā /
analyzed: gāndhārīm brūhi sahasā mohe majjati no yathā

original: eṣaivoktavatī pūrvaṃ jaye dharmo nibandhanam // Bhmj_12.13 //
analyzed: eṣā evā uktavatī pūrvam jaye dharmaḥ nibandhanam

original: iti teṣāṃ girā kṣipraṃ samohaṃ kauraveśvaram /
analyzed: iti teṣām girā kṣipram sa moham kaurava īśvaram
draṣṭum abhyāyayuḥ pārthāḥ lajjā namra śirodharāḥ
āliliṅga tatas rājā prajñācakṣuḥ yudhiṣṭhiram
bhīmam māyā mayam paścāt kṛṣṇa buddhyā vivardhitam
āyayau mārutiḥ dveṣāt bhujābhyām tena pīḍitaḥ
prayayau kaṇaśas tena sarve vismayam āyayuḥ
dharmasūnuḥ tatas vṛddhām praṇanāma pativratām
gāndhārīm bhartṛ sādṛśyāt sadā vastra āvṛta īkṣaṇām
adhas nipatitaḥ tasyāḥ pādayoḥ dharmanandanaḥ
dadāha aṅguṣṭha yugalam dṛṣṭi kopa anala ākulaḥ
tatas hatānām duḥkha ārtā vallabhā jagatībhujām
raṇa madhyam pratiyayuḥ gāndhārī ca snuṣā ākulā
vilapya karuṇam tatra vihvalā subala ātmajā

original: babhāṣe keśavaṃ sāsrā divyadṛṣṭiḥ pativratā // Bhmj_12.20 //
analyzed: babhāṣe keśavam sa asrā divya dṛṣṭiḥ pativratā
paśya etān kṛṣṇa mad putrān sīmantinyaḥ raṇe hatān

original: śocanti yāḥ purā dṛṣṭā na sūryeṇa na cendunā // Bhmj_12.21 //
analyzed: śocanti yāḥ purā dṛṣṭāḥ na sūryeṇa na ca indunā
paśya antaḥpura cārībhiḥ apsarobhiḥ iva āvṛtaḥ

original: saṃmukhaṃ nihataḥ śūro bhagnorustanayo mama // Bhmj_12.22 //
analyzed: saṃmukham nihataḥ śūraḥ bhagna ūruḥ tanayaḥ mama
hata nāgām hata aśvām ca suyodhana vadhūḥ iyam
kṣmām sapatnīm iva ālokya paśya mūrcchām upāgatā
labdha saṃjñā śanais eṣā parimṛjya rajaḥ ciram
rāja rājasya mahiṣī paripṛcchati vallabham
utsaṅge mām iva ādāya ratna aṃśukavatīm gadām

original: dorbhyāṃ ca bhuvamāliṅgya kathaṃ supto 'si bhūpate // Bhmj_12.25 //
analyzed: dorbhyām ca bhuvam āliṅgya katham suptaḥ si bhūpate
na te kanaka paryaṅke vilāsa śayane vṛtā

original: asminnarapate suptā raktakṣībā kathaṃ śivā // Bhmj_12.26 //
analyzed: asmin narapate suptā rakta kṣībā katham śivā
eṣaḥ duḥśāsanaḥ śete priyaḥ ramyaḥ tava anujaḥ

original: nipītaṃ rākṣaseneva yasya bhīmena śoṇitam // Bhmj_12.27 //
analyzed: nipītam rākṣasena iva yasya bhīmena śoṇitam

original: ayaṃ te dayitaḥ putro lakṣmaṇaḥ śatruṇā hataḥ /
analyzed: ayam te dayitaḥ putraḥ lakṣmaṇaḥ śatruṇā hataḥ

original: sajīva iva vaktuṃ tvaṃ nātha kiṃcitsamīhate // Bhmj_12.28 //
analyzed: sa jīvaḥ iva vaktum tvam nātha kiṃcid samīhate
danta stambhau iva bhraṣṭau anaṅga aṅgana toraṇau
saralau
manyete kāla dantinā
ayam te mauliḥ ucitaḥ ciram mūrdhni sukha uṣitaḥ
rociṣṇuḥ iha vibhraṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ kānti parikṣayāt
pādābhyām rudhira ārdrābhyām raṇa saṃcāriṇaḥ tava
vāntā iva satatā pītā rāja cūḍāmaṇi chaviḥ
lokapāle tvayi divam yāte nandana kautukāt
dhanya abhimāni tā iva ekā kīrtiḥ tvad anuyāyinī
bhrājiṣṇu ratna valaye doṣṇi karpūra pāṇḍure
kasya anyasya mahī yātu śeṣa viśrānti nirvṛtim
yaḥ sa kaṅkaṇ jhāṅkāraiḥ vyajanaiḥ vijitaḥ nṛpaḥ
saḥ yam adya api vījyate
iti duryodhana vadhūm krośantīm kaurava striyaḥ

original: samākṛṣya viveṣṭante patitāḥ paśya bhūtale // Bhmj_12.35 //
analyzed: samākṛṣya viveṣṭante patitāḥ paśya bhū tale
itas subhadrā saubhadram putrakam putra vatsalā
parimārṣṭi rajaḥ digdham stanau dātum iva udyatā
aṅke śaśāṅka sadṛśam kṛtvā iyam patyuḥ uttarā
vadanam bāṣpa dhārābhiḥ prakṣālya paripṛcchati
ayi nātha tathā tat tat uktvā praṇaya peśalam

original: bhūmimāliṅgya kiṃ śeṣe priyāmadya vihāya mām // Bhmj_12.38 //
analyzed: bhūmim āliṅgya kim śeṣe priyām adya vihāya mām
gāṇḍīvadhanvanaḥ putraḥ cakrapāṇeḥ svasuḥ sutaḥ

original: tvaṃ śakrasadṛśaḥ śaurye kathameko hataḥ paraiḥ // Bhmj_12.39 //
analyzed: tvam śakra sadṛśaḥ śaurye katham ekaḥ hataḥ paraiḥ
idam te vadanam kāntam kamalā kamala upamam
nūnam āpāsyati smeram dhanyaḥ svarga vadhū janaḥ
nanu anaṅga tayā anaṅgaḥ tvayi abhūt na upama āspadam
saḥ yam aṅga vadhāt kānta tvayā adya saphalīkṛtaḥ
śaśāṅka śaṅkayā śaṅke tvayi tridiva gāmini
karoti tārakā paṅktiḥ kaṇṭhe muktā āvalī bhramam
yā aham tvayā nava vadhūḥ prati ālāpam purā arthitā

original: tvāṃ svayaṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ māṃ kathaṃ na pratibhāṣase // Bhmj_12.43 //
analyzed: tvām svayam bhāṣyamāṇām mām katham na pratibhāṣase
kva nu sarva guṇa grāma gaṇanīyasya te gatam
dākṣiṇyam svarga lalanā saktaḥ yat mām upekṣase
punar kartum aśakye smin dhātuḥ saubhāgya varṇane
prahṛtam tvad śarīre yauḥ dhik tān dagdha vilocanān
kusumāyudha tulyasya kusumāyudha tā eva te

original: nūnaṃ raṇe 'bhūttvāṃ vīrāḥ sehire kathamanyathā // Bhmj_12.46 //
analyzed: nūnam raṇe bhūt tvām vīrāḥ sehire katham anyathā
evam vilāpinīm bālām balāt ākṛṣya putrikām
virāṭa patnyaḥ yānti etāḥ rudantyaḥ patyuḥ antikam
sa anujaḥ sa suta amātyaḥ virāṭa nṛpatiḥ hataḥ
vadhūbhiḥ āvṛtaḥ bhūmau divi iva apsarasām gaṇaiḥ
eṣā su doṣṇā bhartuḥ ānanam

original: vilokya tāraṃ krośantī ruddhā sakhyeva mūrcchayā // Bhmj_12.49 //
analyzed: vilokya tāram krośantī ruddhā sakhyā iva mūrcchayā
kravyāda lupta avayavam paśya karṇam vadhū janaḥ
parāyaṇam kauravāṇām āliṅgya āliṅgya śocati

original: nāmni saṃkīrtite yasya prāpurnidrāṃ na śatravaḥ /
analyzed: nāmni saṃkīrtite yasya prāpuḥ nidrām na śatravaḥ

original: sa tvamadya hataḥ śeṣe dhikkālasya durantatām // Bhmj_12.51 //
analyzed: sa tvam adya hataḥ śeṣe dhik kālasya duranta tām
jambhāriḥ abhavat yasya varma kuṇḍala yācakaḥ

original: satyasaṃdhaḥ kathaṃ kaṇaḥ karṇaśeṣīkṛtaḥ khagaiḥ // Bhmj_12.52 //
analyzed: satya saṃdhaḥ katham kaṇaḥ karṇa śeṣīkṛtaḥ khagaiḥ
nisarga visaraḥ sargaḥ sarvathā hata vedhasaḥ

original: kṛtvā yaḥ śakratulyatvaṃ na cakre kalpasākṣiṇam // Bhmj_12.53 //
analyzed: kṛtvā yaḥ śakra tulya tvam na cakre kalpa sākṣiṇam
iti prakīrṇa ābharaṇāḥ krandantyaḥ karṇa yoṣitaḥ
dārayanti kuca ābhogam vṛṣasenasya mātaraḥ

original: paśya jāmātaraṃ kṛṣṇa hataṃ mama jayadratham /
analyzed: paśya jāmātaram kṛṣṇa hatam mama jayadratham

original: bālā śociti matputrī na ca jānāti śocitum // Bhmj_12.55 //
analyzed: bālā śociti mad putrī na ca jānāti śocitum
eṣa śalyaḥ hataḥ saṃkhye ripu śalya parākramaḥ
śalya tām adhunā yātaḥ paśya antaḥpura yoṣitām
paśya asya kṛṣyate jihvā madra rājasya vāyasaiḥ

original: rādheyasyaiṣa vidadhe yudhi tejovadhaṃ yayā // Bhmj_12.57 //
analyzed: rādheyasya eṣa vidadhe yudhi tejaḥ vadham yayā

original: paśya droṇasya samare vahneḥ śāntārciṣo yathā /
analyzed: paśya droṇasya samare vahneḥ śānta arciṣaḥ yathā

original: saṃskāraḥ kriyate vipraiḥ krimīnutsārya mūrcchitān // Bhmj_12.58 //
analyzed: saṃskāraḥ kriyate vipraiḥ krimīn utsārya mūrcchitān
eṣa bhūriśravāḥ vīraḥ somadatta sutaḥ hataḥ
mahiṣyā śocyate vīraḥ chinna bāhuḥ kirīṭinā
raṇa yajña mahī yūpe yūpa dhvaja bhuje tava

original: nikṛte jiṣṇunā manye yaśo nirlūnamātmanaḥ // Bhmj_12.60 //
analyzed: nikṛte jiṣṇunā manye yaśaḥ nirlūnam ātmanaḥ

original: śivākṛṣṭe virautīva doṣṇi te kaṅkaṇāvalī // Bhmj_12.61 //
analyzed: śiva ākṛṣṭe virauti iva doṣṇi te kaṅkaṇa āvalī
candrikā ābharaṇe harmye tvad prema ābharaṇāḥ striyaḥ

original: āliliṅga purā so 'yaṃ vilāsābharaṇo bhujaḥ // Bhmj_12.62 //
analyzed: āliliṅga purā saḥ yam vilāsa ābharaṇaḥ bhujaḥ
arthi kalpadrume doṣṇi chinne smin śatru yoṣitām
vaidhavya dīkṣā guru tām vīra yāsyati kaḥ paraḥ
haṭha kaṇṭhagrahaḥ prauḍhaḥ kaḥ nāma hariṇīdṛśām
keyūra kānti kalikām karṇapūrīkariṣyati
iti pralāpinī vakti vihvalā kamaleśvaram
pravaram bhūri yaśasam bhūri śravasam ātmanā
hita upadeśa vidveṣī śukuniḥ paśya bhakṣyate
śivābhiḥ aśiva ācāraḥ veśyābhiḥ iva vittavān
pṛthivī kṣapitā kṣipram kṣudraiḥ karṇa anta gāmibhiḥ
itas pūrvam anena akṣaiḥ itas bāṇaiḥ kirīṭinā
itas su dakṣiṇasya etāḥ priyāḥ kāmboja bhūpateḥ
hṛdayāni pralāpena dārayanti aśmanām api
saubhadra śara nirbhinnam rāja putram bṛhadbalam
etāḥ komala kāminyaḥ śotanti śaśi rociṣam
dhṛṣṭadyumna sutāḥ dīpta hema mālā vibhūṣitāḥ

original: bhāntyete droṇanihatā bhraṣṭā vidyādharā iva // Bhmj_12.70 //
analyzed: bhānti ete droṇa nihatāḥ bhraṣṭāḥ vidyādharāḥ iva
kekayaḥ dhṛṣṭaketuḥ ca jayatsenaḥ ca māgadhaḥ
vṛddhaḥ ca rājā drupadaḥ sa amātya suta bāndhavaḥ
alāyudhaḥ lambusaḥ ca bhagadattaḥ śrutāyudhaḥ
vinda anuvindau āvantyau jalasaṃdhaḥ sulocanaḥ
pravarāḥ pārthivāḥ ca anye hatāḥ vīrāḥ sahasraśas
labdha jīvāḥ iva ābhānti kāntābhiḥ parivāritāḥ
śaktena api tvayā kṛṣṇa yasmāt kāmāt upekṣitāḥ

original: sarvakṣayādvā dveṣādvā sarvajñena ca līlayā // Bhmj_12.74 //
analyzed: sarva kṣayāt vā dveṣāt vā sarva jñena ca līlayā

original: ṣaṅviṃśe vatsare prāpte vṛṣṇīnāṃ samare mithaḥ /
analyzed: ṣaṅviṃśe vatsare prāpte vṛṣṇīnām samare mithas
tasmāt tau api bhavitā vipulaḥ bāndhava kṣayaḥ
tava api anucitaḥ kaḥ pi vadha hetuḥ bhaviṣyati
iti uktvā tāra karuṇam ruroda subala ātmajā
tām uvāca hasan kṛṣṇaḥ sva icchā sṛṣṭa laya udayaḥ
vidhinā etat purā ādiṣṭam punar uktam tvayā uditam
avaśya bhāvini śucam kṣaye smin mā vṛthā kṛthāḥ

original: avaśyaṃ kṣatriyasute hantāhaṃ kila vidviṣām // Bhmj_12.78 //
analyzed: avaśyam kṣatriya sute hantā aham kila vidviṣām
iti uktavati dāśārhe dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ yudhiṣṭhiram

original: gatiṃ papraccha vīrāṇāṃ parimāṇaṃ ca saṃkṣaye // Bhmj_12.79 //
analyzed: gatim papraccha vīrāṇām parimāṇam ca saṃkṣaye
tam abravīt dharmarājaḥ lakṣaṇā madhuram raṇe

original: viṃśatiśca sahasrāṇi koṭyaḥ ṣaḍadhikāśca ṣaṭ // Bhmj_12.80 //
analyzed: viṃśatiḥ ca sahasrāṇi koṭyaḥ ṣaṣ adhikāḥ ca ṣaḍ
vīrāṇām gaṇanā arhāṇām asmin āyodhane hatāḥ

original: aprahṛṣṭā hatā ye ca te gandharvapuraṃ gatāḥ // Bhmj_12.81 //
analyzed: a prahṛṣṭāḥ hatāḥ ye ca te gandharva puram gatāḥ
bhayāt parāṅmukhāḥ ye ca te yakṣa tvam upāgatāḥ
ye tu akhaṇḍita sattva sthāḥ te brahma bhuvanam śritāḥ
meru pārśvam prayātāḥ te ye padbhyām vāhanaiḥ hatāḥ
prasādāt lomaśasya etat muneḥ paśyāmi divya dṛś
iti uktvā dharmatanayaḥ hatānām jagatībhujām
bandhūnām ca ādideśa āśu saṃskāram vibhava ucitam
indrasena mukhāḥ sūtāḥ saṃjayaḥ viduraḥ tathā

original: yuyutsuśca girā tasya teṣāmantyavidhau yayuḥ // Bhmj_12.85 //
analyzed: yuyutsuḥ ca girā tasya teṣām antya vidhau yayuḥ
mālyaiḥ vastraiḥ aṃ lakāraiḥ bhūṣitāḥ te mahā rathāḥ
citā analeṣu nihitāḥ sva pratāpam iva āviśan
atha udatiṣṭhat nārīṇām saṃhatānām itastatas
mithas kaṇṭha vilagnānām karuṇaḥ rodana dhvaniḥ
dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa sahitaḥ sa anugaḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
anuyātaḥ nṛpa strībhiḥ yayau snātum atha āpagām
śrāvitaḥ karṇa vṛttāntam sa mātrā gūḍha saṃbhavam

original: bhrātre duḥkhāddadau tasmai bāṣpamiśrāṃ jalāñjalim // Bhmj_12.89 //
analyzed: bhrātre duḥkhāt dadau tasmai bāṣpa miśrām jala añjalim

original: sa yathāvidhi bandhūnāṃ vidhāya svocitāṃ kriyām /
analyzed: sa yathāvidhi bandhūnām vidhāya sva ucitām kriyām
ādideśa nṛpa strīṇām kriyāyau paṭamaṇḍapān
tāḥ bhūmipāla lalanā sarala āyata akṣyaḥ netrāmbu nirjhara vinirjita tāra hārāḥ
bhāgīrathīm atha yayuḥ kalahaṃsa mañju kāñcī virāvi pulina ūru nitamba bimbāḥ
iti kṣemendra viracitāyām bhāratamañjaryām strīparva
